page.title: 09Grampound Brownie Pack
page.content: At Brownies you do all sorts of things. First you pay 20 pence for subscription. This helps to hire the village hall. If you are early you play till 5.30. First we get into groups called sixes and check we have all our uniform and equipment like mini first-aid kit. Then we get into a circle to sing the welecome song. Brown Owl is what we call our leader. Sometimes we cook or make cards. One of the helpers teaches us how to use a telephone box. When you do things like first aid you get a badge if you pass the test. The badge is sewed on the right sleeve of your tunic. Our uniforms are brown.We have a yellow tie a brown belt and a brown hat. We have pack holidays. Last year we went to Penzance and stayed in a school.I was sick on the last day.Brownies finishes at 6.45.
